name: Breaking Out (Jana Baloghova, tuomasp, Elias_Peter, matej.baksi@gmail.com, LukevanKlooster, Dibut)
name_original: Breaking Out (Jana Baloghova, tuomasp, Elias_Peter, matej.baksi@gmail.com, LukevanKlooster, Dibut)
description:
Sometimes, you need to let it all out. 

When the pressure of making games is on, when it all builds up and your fragile mind just can't take it anymore... your trusty sledgehammer's got your back.

Rage against the system in the most inconsequential way possible.
